bug.author: takanokage
bug.description:
There seems to be a CMake bug manifested when using object libraries together with Xcode. The solution might not be as simple as not using object libraries because this is the mechanism that I was hoping to use to fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/issues/393>#393</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://cmake.org/pipermail/cmake/2016-April/063169.html>supporting link1</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cmake.org/Bug/view.php?id=14768>supporting link2</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15369>supporting link3</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/17500>supporting link4</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Notes for <denchmark-link:https://github.com/qianyizh>@qianyizh</denchmark-link> : As of now, is not located on the build folder after build for some reason, and sequential library linking steps got failed.
This is very bad. I will take over the ownership.
